note: I'm a South African writer at a learning technology company, with a side business in HR and D&I consulting and coaching/counselling. My qualifications are in Psychology and Political Science, and I'm currently busy completing a Masters in Human Rehabilitation Science. I'm proudly disabled, and passionate about disability advocacy. Also, I drink too much wine and I'm a cat lover.

name: Languages
value: English, Afrikaans, Xhosa, and a little French

name: Random Facts About Me
value: I'm a Targaryen, Gryffindor who does not support Rowling, very anti multi-level marketing, not a morning person, love espresso, hate the cold, write songs about my exes, and my latest pet peeve is people using the word "journey" for absolutely everything.
